title: Programming:
items: Front-end development: HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap
Back-end development: Django and Django REST Framework
Mobile development: Android Framework and its features (Room database, Retrofit, Material Design, Constraint Layout...)
Test Driven Development: Selenium (Python), Pytest (Python), Unittest (Python) ,Espresso (Java), JUnit (Java)
Databases: relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite) and non-relational databases (MongoDB)
